product.title: REMINGTON ONE Multi-Style Ionic Hair Dryer with Curl Diffuser and Flyaway Tamer, Black
product.description: The REMINGTON ONE Multi-Style Ionic Hair Dryer is designed to make at-home hair styling easier, faster, and more precise. This lightweight hair dryer features a 50% shorter barrel for improved control and a 15% lighter design for more comfortable use. It comes with three styling attachments to meet different needs: a Flyaway Tamer to smooth frizz and loose strands, a Curl Diffuser that helps define curls while drying quickly, and a Styling Concentrator for targeted airflow and precise results. The advanced ionic technology helps reduce frizz by up to 90%, leaving hair smoother and shinier. With four heat settings, two speed options, and a cool shot button, you can easily customize your styling routine. The REMINGTON ONE Multi-Style Ionic Hair Dryer also includes a hang loop, a cord wrap strap, and a 6-foot cord for flexible use and easy storage. It's a reliable, user-friendly tool that helps you achieve salon-style hair at home.

product.description_full:
The REMINGTON ONE Multi-Style Ionic Hair Dryer is designed to make at-home hair styling easier, faster, and more precise. This lightweight hair dryer features a 50% shorter barrel for improved control and a 15% lighter design for more comfortable use. It comes with three styling attachments to meet different needs: a Flyaway Tamer to smooth frizz and loose strands, a Curl Diffuser that helps define curls while drying quickly, and a Styling Concentrator for targeted airflow and precise results. The advanced ionic technology helps reduce frizz by up to 90%, leaving hair smoother and shinier. With four heat settings, two speed options, and a cool shot button, you can easily customize your styling routine. The REMINGTON ONE Multi-Style Ionic Hair Dryer also includes a hang loop, a cord wrap strap, and a 6-foot cord for flexible use and easy storage. It's a reliable, user-friendly tool that helps you achieve salon-style hair at home. * Multi-style design with Curl Diffuser, Flyaway Tamer, and Styling Concentrator attachments for the REMINGTON One Multi-Style Ionic Hair Dryer
 * Double ionic system helps reduce frizz and boost shine for smooth, healthy-looking hair
 * Ceramic hair dryer technology provides even heat distribution to protect hair from damage
 * ThermaCare sensor regulates heat to maintain safe styling temperatures
 * Lightweight body and 50% shorter barrel for better control and precision
product.description_full_html:
The REMINGTON ONE Multi-Style Ionic Hair Dryer is designed to make at-home hair styling easier, faster, and more precise. This lightweight hair dryer features a 50% shorter barrel for improved control and a 15% lighter design for more comfortable use. It comes with three styling attachments to meet different needs: a Flyaway Tamer to smooth frizz and loose strands, a Curl Diffuser that helps define curls while drying quickly, and a Styling Concentrator for targeted airflow and precise results. The advanced ionic technology helps reduce frizz by up to 90%, leaving hair smoother and shinier. With four heat settings, two speed options, and a cool shot button, you can easily customize your styling routine. The REMINGTON ONE Multi-Style Ionic Hair Dryer also includes a hang loop, a cord wrap strap, and a 6-foot cord for flexible use and easy storage. It's a reliable, user-friendly tool that helps you achieve salon-style hair at home.
  • Multi-style design with Curl Diffuser, Flyaway Tamer, and Styling Concentrator attachments for the REMINGTON One Multi-Style Ionic Hair Dryer
  • Double ionic system helps reduce frizz and boost shine for smooth, healthy-looking hair
  • Ceramic hair dryer technology provides even heat distribution to protect hair from damage
  • ThermaCare sensor regulates heat to maintain safe styling temperatures
  • Lightweight body and 50% shorter barrel for better control and precision

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
